project_abstract.cdata: The Daqing Oil Project will help increase production from the DDaqing oil field and introduce modern technological innovations in equipment and oilfield practices to the Chinese oil industry. The project will do this by drilling oil and water injection wells; installing water injection stations and other surface utilities; providing facilities for oil treating and transportation, and gas gathering, treating and handling; and providing laboratories, consultants (466 man-months) and staff training to improve the efficiency of oilfield practices. An important feature of the project is the series of studies and surveys aimed at improving operations and planning of future investments in the petroleum subsector. The main quantifiable benefit of the project is the increased production of oil and gas, but the project also aims to achieve a significant transfer of modern technology to China.

P003415.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>大庆石油高台子油层发展项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目将帮助增加大庆油田产量，向中国石油行业推介设备现代化技术创新改造和现代油田实践方法。为此，项目将开钻油井和注水井，建设注水站和其它地面设施，提供石油处理和运输、油气收集和处置设施，建设实验室并提供咨询专家（466个人月）和人员培训，以提高油田实践效率。本项目的一大特点是开展一系列研究和调查，目的是改进石油行业今后投资项目的运行和规划。本项目可量化的主要效益是石油和天然气产量增加，但项目也将向中国大量转让现代技术。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
